__e: Blessed are you among women and blessed is the fruit of your womb.
The Lord is with you ... thou art blessed among women ... and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus.
She is the fruit of your love.
This village was a plum to satan one he could not resist, so he came here and embarked upon a program of corruption.
That's where I wish I'd been born, lovingly conceived after one of their walks.
That, my father, will, perhaps, come by and by and it is said that love is often the fruit of marriage.
